attributes.action: Cancel exams for year 10 and 12 in 2022
attributes.additional_details: Government have just cancelled the exams , but they aren’t considering the year groups due to sit there’s the year ahead, year 10 and 11 are the most vital years for GCSE as are 12 and 13 for A levels. They all have equally missed the same amount of content and learning and are now facing online learning which proves so very difficult for children to learn . Please consider this thank you
attributes.background: As exams have just been cancelled ,we have to consider what’s ahead for year 10’s and year 12’s they have missed just as much content and will continue to receive online learning. Online learning is hardly beneficial to the student .It seems only fair that yr10 and yr 12 receive the same treatment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
